body.p:
As aforesaid, there's no easy way of getting to La Vergne by train without an overnight stay somewhere. For my third and last escape to France this year, I took the simplest route
Oxford to London; London to Paris, arriving 2217 pm on 8 Nov
Stay at one of the two or three anonymous hotels opposite the Gare d'Austerlitz (which is still being renovated)
Get up in time for the 0930 train to La Souterraine
Lucy picked me up and took me home via Lidl
16 nov 1406 dep La Souterraine -Vierzon - Tours; stay at flat near station
21 nov 1229: Tours - Le Mans - Chartres; stay at le Jardin Cathedrale
22 nov 1229: Chartres- Montparnasse; stay at Adagio aparthotel; Nanterre PASP
